item.title: @elonmusk: The biggest mistake the Trump admin is making right now is taking half measures. If Democrats get in...
item.description: The biggest mistake the Trump admin is making right now is taking half measures. If Democrats get into power again they will arrest and jail huge numbers of Republican politicians, media figures, voters etc. Half measures get you killed. Jennifer Welch and Jim Acosta should be arrested. The corrupt criminal Democrat party leaders need to be arrested and jailed. If you don't strike first and strike hard, you will lose the only opportunity you have to save yourself and save your voters from the inevitable communist purge.

item.title: @elonmusk: His skepticism is warranted. This is a hard AI problem, but, as your drive with him showed, this is ...
item.description: His skepticism is warranted. This is a hard AI problem, but, as your drive with him showed, this is largely also a solved problem. What remains is the long tail march of 9‚Äôs. Getting to 99.9999% reliability and beyond. Understand the vast number of nuances of reality.

item.description: OH MY GOSH! I went on live television with@kayleighmcenanyon Fox News to deliver a message: Senate Majority Leader Thune, it‚Äôs time to nuke the filibuster & pass the SAVE Act. The American people demand election reform ‚Äî now! Peacefully.

item.title: @elonmusk: üá∞üá∑ SOUTH KOREAN SHIPPING GIANT SWITCHES ENTIRE FLEET TO STARLINK Korea Line Corp, the shipping branc...
item.description: üá∞üá∑ SOUTH KOREAN SHIPPING GIANT SWITCHES ENTIRE FLEET TO STARLINK Korea Line Corp, the shipping branch of SM Group, wrapped up installing Starlink on every single one of their 38 ships, bulk carriers, and LNG tankers alike. They're the first in South Korea's shipping scene to fully switch over. Now they've got lightning-fast data transfers, smoother ship-to-office comms, smarter operations, better navigation safety, and way happier crews on those epic voyages. Source:@serobinsonjr

item.title: @elonmusk: Starlink is quickly emerging as the go to inflight connectivity solution for airlines globally. Unit...
item.description: Starlink is quickly emerging as the go to inflight connectivity solution for airlines globally. United Airlines Emirates Air France British Airways Qatar Airways Korean Air Asiana Airlines Alaska Airlines Virgin Atlantic WestJet SAS Scandinavian Airlines Iberia Aer Lingus Vueling LEVEL flydubai airBaltic Jin Air ZIPAIR Tokyo Air Busan Air Seoul JSX Hawaiian Airlines Air Canada Any airline not using Starlink is falling behind.
